department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: You will learn how to use Deep Learning Model to train your data and get a good prediction.
goal.en: You will learn how to use Deep Learning Model to train your data and get a good prediction.

Chap02: Pretrained networks
Chap03: How to use tensor
Chap04: Real-world data representation using tensors

Chap06: Using a neural network to fit the data
Chap07: Learning from images
Chap08: Using a neural network to fit the data
